featured.text: Which of the following is the best title for this passage? (A) Totem Poles, the Legends of Aboriginal Peoples (B) Totem Poles: Their Functions (C) Totem Poles, Symbols of Historical Resistance (D) Totem Poles: Their Designs 46.

Laughter, too, has a beneficial effect on our immune system, (38) the production of white blood cells and increasing our resistance to infection.(39) makes a difference to our appearance, too, when we relax our facial muscles!

definition.zh_def: 抵抗力；反抗或抵制的能力或行為。
definition.en_def: The ability to withstand or oppose something, often used in the context of physical forces or social movements.
definition.example: The community showed great resistance against the proposed changes to the local park.
